lead_paragraph: The 2021 Solheim Cup will be played at the fabled Inverness Club in Toledo, Ohio, the Ladies Professional Golf Association (LPGA) announced on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Solheim Cup to Played at Inverness in 2021
headline.main: Solheim Cup to Played at Inverness in 2021
